DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics safety oral administration HCP1104 Eperisone Hydrochloride plus Aceclofenac .
DOC.brief_title: Partial Replicated Crossover Clinical Study Compare Pharmacokinectic Characteristics Eperisone Hydrochloride Aceclofenac With HCP1104 Treatment Those Co-administration Eperisone Hydrochloride 50mg Tablet Aceclofenac 100mg Tablet Healthy Adult Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics safety oral administration HCP1104 Eperisone Hydrochloride plus Aceclofenac .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer , age 20 45 BMI ＞20kg/m2 ＜28kg/m2 subject Informed investigational nature study voluntarily agree participate study Use prescription medication within 14 day prior Day 1 Use medication within 7 day prior Day 1 Participation another clinical study within 60 day prior start study drug administration
